articles.content: In a massive development in giving the manufacturing sector an Atmanirbhar push, E-Commerce and technology giant Amazon has decided to begin Electronic Devices manufacturing in India. A virtual meeti… [+3138 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Unacademy acquires majority stake in TapChief - Entrackr
articles.description: Unacademy has announced the acquisition of TapChief, a networking platform for professionals in a deal which will allow the edtech unicorn to make its foray into a new segment of readying students for jobs. TapChief is set to join Unacademy with a valuation o…
